com.communote.server.core.follow

Class FollowManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.follow.FollowManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FollowManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FollowManagementImpl

    public abstract class FollowManagementBase
extends Object
implements FollowManagement

    Spring Service base class for com.communote.server.service.follow.FollowManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    FollowManagement

      • followBlog

        public void followBlog(Long blogId)
                throws NotFoundException,
                       BlogAccessException
        Description copied from interface: FollowManagement
        Adds the specified blog/topic to the followed items of the current user.
        Specified by:
        followBlog in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic to follow
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the topic does not exist
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic
        See Also:
        {@inheritDoc}

      • followDiscussion

        public void followDiscussion(Long discussionId)
                      throws BlogAccessException,
                             NotFoundException
        Adds the discussion with the specified ID to the followed items of the current user.
        Specified by:
        followDiscussion in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        discussionId - the ID of the discussion to follow
        Throws:
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic of the discussion or the discussion
        NotFoundException - in case the discussion does not exist
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.followDiscussion(Long)

      • followDiscussionByNoteId

        public void followDiscussionByNoteId(Long noteId)
                              throws NotFoundException,
                                     BlogAccessException
        Adds the discussion of the specified note to the followed items of the current user.
        Specified by:
        followDiscussionByNoteId in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note whose discussion should be followed
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the discussion does not exist
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic of the discussion or the discussion
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.followDiscussionByNoteId(Long)

      • followsBlog

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public boolean followsBlog(Long blogId)
        Returns whether the current user follows the blog.
        Specified by:
        followsBlog in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the blog
        Returns:
        true if the blog exists and the current user follows that blog, false otherwise
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.followsBlog(Long)

      • unfollowBlog

        public void unfollowBlog(Long blogId)
        Removes the specified blog/topic from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        unfollowBlog in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic to unfollow
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.unfollowBlog(Long)

      • unfollowDiscussion

        public void unfollowDiscussion(Long discussionId)
        Removes the discussion with the specified ID from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        unfollowDiscussion in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        discussionId - the ID of the discussion to unfollow
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.unfollowDiscussion(Long)

      • unfollowDiscussionByNoteId

        public void unfollowDiscussionByNoteId(Long noteId)
        Removes the discussion of the specified note from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        unfollowDiscussionByNoteId in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note whose discussion should be unfollowed
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.unfollowDiscussionByNoteId(Long)

      • unfollowTag

        public void unfollowTag(Long tagId)
        Removes the specified tag from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen. When unfollowing a tag all tags with the same lower case writing will be unfollowed too.
        Specified by:
        unfollowTag in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        tagId - the ID of the tag to unfollow
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.unfollowTag(Long)

      • unfollowUser

        public void unfollowUser(Long userId)
        Removes the specified user from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        unfollowUser in interface FollowManagement
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to follow
        See Also:
        FollowManagement.unfollowUser(Long)
